Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "From the records of the Corrupted's memory shell, there's an individual named Gabriel ordering them to research M.I.N.D. technology...", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Gabriel... From the info I have, there are several Ascendant members, and this Gabriel person... He might be one of them!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "That's possible... But we don't have any more info for now.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'At least for now, M.I.N.D. technology still seems to be impenetrable to the Corrupted here.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The special properties of consciousness make it so that the longer it is stored within a container, the more it deteriorates.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What these Corrupted can only do is to plunder and find new consciousnesses and connect them into these projection devices.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Then creating a virtual M.I.N.D. to display in real space with this roundabout way to observe and research it.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why would you ask this of all questions—', 4: '3'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '—From what I know, consciousness processing is much more difficult than it looks on paper. Only the top researchers in the Science Council have the prowess to fiddle with consciousnesses.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But there have not been cases of consciousness copying in Babylonia's database. Any form of consciousness meddling has been strictly forbidden by Humanity.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So who do these imprisoned consciousnesses belong to?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Do you still not get it? It's obviously—", 4: '3'}
